name: taxa-4(20),11-dien-5alpha-ol,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (13alpha-hydroxylating)
definition: Taxa-4(20),11(12)-dien-5alpha-ol + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Taxa-4(20),11(12)-dien-5alpha,13alpha-diol + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
